comment:
You are making a mistake while underestimating this Man!!

He is like a Sniper gun. If it triggers, then only hit its exact target,

Thanks, Garvit for being a nice buddy. I won't forget the khoof you created in the Rishikesh trip : )

(Keep Smiling)
name: Harsh Jha

comment: From gulgula to whatnot the glue of our group🫂. The one who introduced me to the campus. Thanks for that 😌😌. It's been an awesome ride with you. A person with most knowledge and  one who always keeps his promises. Keep growing brother🙏🏻🙏🏻.
name: Ayush

comment: Cute, golu molu and handsome. The talks with you about future were amazing😬. Teko bhi bandi mil jayegi bhai itni chinta mt kara kr. Valorant freak. 318 supremacy.🤝
name: Akshat Nahata

comment: One of the first people jisse baat ki maine aur wo last Tak bohat achha friend ban gya...bohat sweet aur caring Banda hai yaar tu aur har plan ke liye ready rhta.. Bangalore mein bhi maze kiye bohat apan ne...jaldi jaldi Chennai se Bangalore aajana ab ...phir se maze krenge😂😂
name: Bhavya Gupta

comment: The fun-loving, curious dude who's always up for a good time, even if it means ditching work. A real joy to have around! 😚
name: Badal

comment:
FOMO kya hota hai isse pata chala......masoom....mehnati ...madadgaar..aur mehroom(ladki se).
Khush reh ...love u😘

comment: Heyy Garvit! Had a blast with you in Bangalore. From all of the weekend trips to exploring the streets at night and the search for food 😂😂. Your sense of humour is amazing. Stay the same and be in touch 🙌
name: Neyasha Sinha

comment: Now imagine a cute teddy bear  jo muh kholte hi gaali deta ho, that’s him. Woh bhai jo mereko event ke time mila 🫂, I could have never asked for better organisers than you 2. Remember the last minutes changes, random arguments and all the bhasads & headaches we had? All the best and have funnn
name: S Shrevesh

comment: The most cute comedy and depressed looking person. Also the person jisme mere ex pe kala jadu karke uske saath kiss kara tha🙂. Thanks for being the reason of my breakup(jk) and for appreciating my jokes. Also thanks for mkg's project😂
name: Riya

comment: "Garvit Bhaiya, your constant support has been my guiding light since day one. Thank you for being there through Covid, exams, placements, and everything in between. Your wisdom and availability have made all the difference. Grateful for your mentorship!"
name: Sarthak Agarwal

comment: Such a cute bubbly human you are aww, not just by looks but by nature too, hardworking and reliable and understanding and funny, thank you for letting me pinch your cheeks atleast in the convocation 🥹🥹
name: K Madhumitha

comment:
Bhai ko dekh ke kisi company ke CEO wali feeling aati hai
...Bhai apna core- civil , SDE sabme topper hai .... Agli baar mile to kisi company ka CEO banke milna ... All the best for your future
name: Manav Kumar Sinha

comment: Badiya admi haii. helping and undoubtedly one of the best dance partners around🕺. Khush reh aise hi. Best Wishes bhai for future🤗.
name: Harsh Jain

comment: Hey gulgule Gravit (intentional 🙂), Things have not been so smooth between us but still humne kabhi uss cheez ko intrude krne ni diya apne bich. So cheerfull but tere RR 👌, maza aata h unhe sunne m {iss baar photo daal dunga dw}. Stay same and remain a mdarfkr (one of us). Best wishes for future🙌
name: Himanshu Gupta

comment: Mera Masoom roomie jo fomo k karan 5 baar revision kr leta tha😂😂.Tera gate maine nhi toda tha bhai. Boht hardworking aur helpful bnda h, ghumne jaane k liye always in bas kbhi kbhi gussa boht krta h😂. Valo khelna seekhle noob. Khush rehna hmehsa, aur 99.93 ka target yaad rakhna 🙂.
name: Ayush Maheshwari

comment: Super focused on his snipe in Valo and a Sage for health, From ranting about placements to late-night laughs sitting on Sofa, you've been the catalyst for unforgettable memories. Your wisdom, humor, and reliability make you the friend we all cherish. Here's to many more adventures Stay Cool, IceMan
name: Nilay Ganvit

comment:
Banglore homie! Gonna look forward to another jagermeister+ red bull night, musibate aati jati rahegi valo nahi rukna chahiye, 
Ek dusre ko roast karte rahenge jab bhi milenge Stay in touch bro!
name: Daksh Goyal

comment: A fun-loving, bubbly guy, little serious at times but great at heart! Tera ILU ek jhatke mein pakad liya tha, yaad rkhna😂. Really happy that I found a friend like you! Aur shred to bohot jyada kra hai, 2nd yr ke pics dekhne ke baad toh omg!. Gossip waali conversations yaad ayengi. Stay connected 🤗
name: Isha Pankaj Pathak

comment: Yar ye character limit 300 ki hi kyu h ... bohot kuch khna tha ye to bohot k=hi kam pd jayga. Endless memories, enormous funny incidents, hard moments... epic gameplays, innovative strategies.. bhot sara rona dhone ... we had it all...and when it ends, it's like imprints of nails stuck in my walls
name: Sahil Singh Shekhawat

comment: Hello Analyst! Razorpay me nahi ban paya to kya hua😂Intern ke time se jo bonding hui I hope aage bhi same bonding rahegi...Foosball partner jiske sath khlene par koi nahi haara paya. I hope will meet somewhere in life ahead, tab bhi same hi bkc kare apn, aise hi evil smile diya kar bro cute lagta😂
name: Vimal Tatiya

comment: dikhne mei jitna hi cute hai utne hi witty comebacks deta hai. thankful ki bangolre mei maheswari aur tere se close ho paaya, milte chaaro waapas, waise bhi party pending hai, iss baar brewery nahi room pe hai baith ke ......., Stay the same and All the best for your future endeavors
name: Jay Viradiya

comment: The cutest gang member, unofficial member of 404, helper in exams and a pro dsa coder...bhai kisi chiz me piche nhi hai (fomo is the reason)... gym civil coding all done.. all side quests completed.... hardworking and disciplined, tbh you are that inspiring friend ppl look up to.. keep it up
name: Jawwad Umar

comment: The only guy I can talk to about anime in our group. Bro's always ready for any plans. The cutest 'golumolu' guy I ever met. Bro changed a lot for the better, whether it's about physique or personality, from 🥺 to 🗿. I'm not worried about the future because I know One Piece will keep us united 👒.
name: Varun Kumar

comment: GG bhai bolu ya puran viram😂. Mehenati aadmi toh tu hai tu bs tension bhut leta h. FOMO ka shikaar hogya h bhai jbki kuch miss kia ni h pr cute sbse jyaada toh yhi h. Aise hi rehna hmesha kyunki sbse cute toh tu hi h, confirm kr skta h zeeshan. TC and be happy bro and milte rehna.
name: PARTH DWIVEDI

comment: We didn't talk much outside Ecell lol, but had a great time working with you man. A dependable guy, cool and collected person. Wish you all the best bro.
name: V Rajkumar Thomas

comment:

Bohot hi mst banda hai.🙌🏻
Saath mein jitni bakaiti maari hai sab bohot yaad aaegi. 
AAINA ka tera short but impactful time bhi kaafi yaad rhega also sorry bhai 🫠
Thanks for all the memories and all the best. 
Milte rehna bhool Mt jana 😂🫂

comment:
Mera chota bhai.Bhai bahot chijo ke capable h bas faltu tension mat liya kar aur...Khush rah hamesha tu hasta hua hi acha lagta h muh mat latkaya kar.Aur hamare alava koi bully kre to bta dena bc🫂
Always happy for u bhai.Keep smiling and grinding (jo ik tu krlega)
gta6 aane de sath hi khelenge bc🫂
